Posts.Title: mastectomy now face chemo and radiotherapy

Posts.Content: After ignoring a lump and it crusted and burst( I know stupid me) I had to go to doctor. I have a problem going out on own which didn't help which was why I ignored symptoms. At hospital had scan, needle biopsy and core biopsy also mammogram a few days later a c t scan. On next appointment with consultant was told scan clear just2 tiny nodules on lungs not to worry about and biopsies clear. I had op two and half weeks ago to remove breast and some nodes. Since then I caught infection and had 10 days antibiotics. On seeing the consultant 3 nighst ago the nurse drained some fluid off and sent to see if any infection. I woke up the first night after that with wet tee shirt where had leaked. The consultant now told me that he removed 7 of 12 nodes and there was cancer there. What was the point of the biopsy as that said they were clear. He c ould not remove the others as they were on a blood vessel so now I am waiting for chemo then radiotherapy.I am 66 years old and was sailing along until I had the latest news. I had been so pleased after the first results which gave me false hope. Now I am depressed and trying so hard not to be for the sake of my poor husband who helped nurse my mother and father and now he has got me. I feel like disappearing and keep crying.
